scripts.check:lint: eslint . --ext .ts && prettier --check "src/**/*.{ts,js,json,md,yml,yaml}" && echo ğŸš¨âœ… Lint check passed!
scripts.check:types: tsc -p tsconfig.typecheck.json && echo ğŸ§ âœ… Type check passed!
scripts.check:knip: knip && echo âœ‚ï¸âœ… Unused code check passed!
scripts.check:dep: depcheck && echo ğŸ“¦âœ… Dependency check passed!
scripts.check:prune: ts-prune ./src && echo ğŸŒ¿âœ… Prune check passed!
scripts.check:test: vitest run --silent --coverage && echo ğŸ§ªâœ… Tests passed!
scripts.check:all: yarn check:lint && yarn check:types && yarn check:knip && yarn check:dep && yarn check:prune && echo ğŸ§°âœ¨ All checks passed! || echo 'âŒ Fix the above issues before committing ğŸ’¡'
